question.title: Could not load definitions from resource org/jetbrains/kotlin/ant/antlib.xml. It could not be found
question.body:
I've got a java program that I've created using Netbeans. I recently had to transfer my files to another laptop and I'm now getting an error when I attempt to build saying:

"Could not load definitions from resource org/jetbrains/kotlin/ant/antlib.xml. It could not be found."

Initially, when I first opened the project in the new netbeans on the new machine it said "could not locate kotlin" so I browsed, selected kotlin-runtime.jar, and netbeans said "problem resolved." Then, when I attempted to build, I got the "Could not load definitions ..." message (above).

Thanks so much for any help/insights on this.

picture of netbeans error message

question_comments.body: Go to Tools > Plugins. Under Available Plugins, search for Kotlin. Install it and restart NetBeans.
